com.jdon.servicelocator
类 ServiceLocatorException

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Throwable
      java.lang.Exception
          com.jdon.servicelocator.ServiceLocatorException
所有已实现的接口：
java.io.Serializable
public class ServiceLocatorException
extends java.lang.Exception

This class implements an exception which can wrapped a lower-level exception.

另请参见：
序列化表格

构造方法摘要
ServiceLocatorException(java.lang.Exception exception)
          Creates a new ServiceLocatorException wrapping another exception, and with no detail message.
ServiceLocatorException(java.lang.String message)
          Creates a ServiceLocatorException with the specified detail message.
ServiceLocatorException(java.lang.String message, java.lang.Exception exception)
          Creates a new ServiceLocatorException wrapping another exception, and with a detail message.
 
方法摘要
 java.lang.Exception getException()
          Gets the wrapped exception.
 java.lang.Exception getRootCause()
          Retrieves (recursively) the root cause exception.
 java.lang.String toString()
           
 
从类 java.lang.Throwable 继承的方法
fillInStackTrace, getCause, getLocalizedMessage, getMessage, getStackTrace, initCause, printStackTrace, printStackTrace, printStackTrace, setStackTrace
 
从类 java.lang.Object 继承的方法
clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait
 

构造方法详细信息

ServiceLocatorException

public ServiceLocatorException(java.lang.String message,
                               java.lang.Exception exception)
Creates a new ServiceLocatorException wrapping another exception, and with a detail message.

参数：
message - the detail message.
exception - the wrapped exception.

ServiceLocatorException

public ServiceLocatorException(java.lang.String message)
Creates a ServiceLocatorException with the specified detail message.

参数：
message - the detail message.

ServiceLocatorException

public ServiceLocatorException(java.lang.Exception exception)
Creates a new ServiceLocatorException wrapping another exception, and with no detail message.

参数：
exception - the wrapped exception.

public java.lang.Exception getException()
Gets the wrapped exception.

返回：
the wrapped exception.

getRootCause

public java.lang.Exception getRootCause()
Retrieves (recursively) the root cause exception.

返回：
the root cause exception.
